DOC.brief_summary: To determine efficacy intravaginal diazepam treatment pelvic pain associate pelvic floor hypertonic disorder .
DOC.brief_title: Vaginal Diazepam Treatment Female Pelvic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Women ask participate already receive standard conservative therapy consist psyllium-based bowel regimen , heat therapy , pelvic stretching exercise , Kegel exercise . Participants randomly assign computer-derived random number sequence ( pregnancy rule ) either treatment group ( intravaginal diazepam ) placebo group Investigators patient blind group assignment . The placebo diazepam tablet distribute participant examining room day allocation . The participant instruct insert diazepam placebo tablet vagina home . The treatment group insert diazepam 10 mg vaginal tablet 1-2 time daily need addition standard conservative therapy . The placebo group receive standard conservative therapy , intravaginal tablet ( visually indistinguishable diazepam ) commercially produce university pharmacy . After 4 week , patient either group option enrol standard routine program ( research ) comprehensive pelvic floor rehabilitation therapy . The Visual Analog Pain Scale , Pelvic Floor Distress Inventory-20 Questionnaire , McGill Pain Questionnaire Global Response Assessment complete participant initial visit , 4 week , 8 week 12 week . Participants give option choose one method return questionnaire : electronic mail , self-addressed home envelope , telephone call .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 year old Primary complaint acute chronic pelvic pain without dyspareunia Physical exam finding consistent levator muscle spasm Capable insert tablet vagina without use applicator . Chronic narcotic use NonEnglish speaking Currently serve prison sentence Stage III great vaginal prolapse Allergies contraindication benzodiazepine Pregnant breastfeed Currently receive comprehensive pelvic floor rehabilitation therapy and/or vaginal valium therapy Unwilling incapable insert tablet vagina without applicator .
